Sprout

Sprout is a spell in Remixed Pixel Dungeon (Elf Affinity).

Description

Awaken the dormant seeds.\nHowever, there should be some greenery on the ground for this spell to succeed.

Stats

  • Magic Affinity: Elf
  • Targeting: cell
  • Level: 2
  • Mana Cost: 5
  • Special Effects: roots enemies in place

Usage

The Sprout spell can be used for:

  • Control applications to restrict enemy movement by rooting them in place
  • Creating temporary obstacles with plant growth
  • Strategic positioning in combat scenarios

Classes

Classes that can use this spell include:

  • Classes with Elf affinity (e.g., Elf class)
  • Other classes that gain access through special means

Strategy

How to effectively use the Sprout spell:

  • Use in corridors to trap enemies and control their movement
  • Effective for separating groups of enemies during combat
  • Synergizes well with ranged attacks since rooted enemies can't approach
  • Best used when there's grassy terrain available for better success chances

Data Validation

This information is extracted directly from the game code and validated against the source implementation. The details are accurate as of the referenced source files and provide reliable information about the spell mechanics.
